releaseNotes: - minor improvements and bug fixes

- Mission Control FUEL TANK! - Base level is FREE
- All Players get 3 mission slots even without Pro Permit
- Ships gain experience and level with each launch to increase capacity and quality
- Mission Epic Research for reduced duration and increased capacity
- Intelligent Crafting
- Small improvements and bug fixes

- New Contracts UI and more
* contains some bug fixes
- New Contracts UI and features

- Small improvements and bug fixes

- Many small/medium improvements and bug fixes
- Increased rewards for random gifts and video gifts
- Slightly reduced rewards for some trophies and daily gifts

- Large increases to rewards for challenges, trophies, and daily gifts
- Bug fixes
- Stability improvements and bug fixes
- Stability improvements and bug fixes

ARTIFACTS IS HERE!
At long last, the largest update ever to Egg, Inc!
Commission deep space exploration missions to uncover over 100 artifacts from long lost civilizations around the galaxy
EXPORE. CRAFT. CUSTOMIZE.
Unlock the secrets of the universe.

- Addresses ad bugs

- bug fixes
- small improvements and bug fixes
- small improvements and bug fixes

- Contract progress details now displayed on contract egg screen
- Exponential contract progress bars to give a better feel on progress (tap to toggle)
- Press and hold boost token gift buttons
- Get a Boost token as a video reward or as a random delivery!
- Elite Contract Goals & Rewards - Contract goals & rewards are now split into standard and elite. Beginning players will have more achievable goals, and expert players will have more fun and earn larger rewards, Egg of Prophecy rewards will be the same between both types!

- Exponential contract progress bars to give a better feel on progress (tap to toggle)
- Press and hold boost token gift buttons
- Get a Boost token as a video reward or as a random delivery!
- Elite Contract Goals & Rewards - Contract goals & rewards are now split into standard and elite. Beginning players will have more achievable goals, and expert players will have more fun and earn larger rewards, Egg of Prophecy rewards will be the same between both types!

- See boost tokens of your coop mates!
- Several minor improvements and bug fixes

- Minor improvements and bug fixes
- Enhanced Privacy Controls

* Alleviates coop kick bug and age restriction bug *
- CCPA Compliance and data consent is now expanded to ALL Players
- Players who do not consent to data collection can now watch *untracked* ads for rewards!
- Piggy grows faster
- Bug fixes

- CCPA Compliance and data consent is now expanded to ALL Players
- Players who do not consent to data collection can now watch *untracked* ads for rewards!
- Piggy grows faster
- Bug fixes

* crash fix, ads fix, instant cash boost bug fix, running chicken bonus increase
- Missions update: Complete 3 missions simultaneously
- Boost Tokens! A new fun way boosts are regulated in Contracts
- New Boost: Soul Mirror - Mirror the Earnings Bonus of the top player in your co-op!
- Balance changes: Some cash have increased BUT while the MAX running chicken bonus reduced, but it now increases farm value AND drone rewards!
- Numerous improvements and bug fixes with more to come!
